channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: First-of-its-kind data shows where displaced New Orleanians landed after Katrina
item.description: Data: Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau data by Elizabeth Fussell of Brown University, performed at a Federal Statistical Research Data Center under FSRD...

item.title: Trump lays out his redistricting endgame: A 100 seat Republican majority
item.description: President Trump shared his ultimate voting reform goal in a Wednesday Truth Social post , saying he wants the GOP to pick up 100 congressional seats. ...

item.title: "Attacked from within": Health workers rage against RFK Jr.

item.title: With the labor market weak, employees are "job hugging"
item.description: Forget job hopping , employees are now "job hugging," holding on tight to their current employer. Why it matters: The labor market is grim at the mome...

item.title: Undocumented immigrant population hit record 14M in 2023: Pew analysis
item.description: Data: Pew Research Center ; Chart: Axios Visuals The number of unauthorized immigrants in the U.S. rose to a record 14 million in 2023, sparked by mig...

item.title: GOP Rep. Chip Roy, at times a party thorn, to run for Texas attorney general
item.description: A member of the ultraconservative Freedom Caucus, Roy joins a crowded field vying to replace Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton.

item.title: James Dobson, evangelical leader behind Focus on the Family, dies at 89
item.description: Beginning in the late 1970s, he helped fuel the rise of the religious right, denouncing abortion and same-sex marriage through his radio show and nonp...

item.title: John Boehner’s road to Alaska: Bourbon shortages in Canada, but optimism reigns

item.title: Trump demands release of Colorado official sentenced in election data scheme
item.description: Former Mesa County clerk Tina Peters is serving a nine-year prison sentence on charges that include conspiracy to commit criminal impersonation.

item.title: Texas state House passes new election map favored by Trump
item.description: The Republican-controlled chamber will gavel back into session Wednesday with an intent to vote on a plan to help the GOP in the midterms.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
